comprehensive_overview: Jmol is an open-source Java viewer for chemical structures in 3D with features for visualization, analysis, and manipulation of molecular structures.
core_features: Jmol allows users to view 3D chemical structures, display crystal structures, visualize protein structures, animate molecules, and perform measurements and analysis on molecular structures. It supports a wide range of file formats for input and output, including CIF, PDB, XYZ, and more. Users can customize the display of molecules with various rendering options, color schemes, and labeling.
